name: Underneath (Event Horizon School)
description:
You wake up as a cute plant-like creature. Eager to explore the world, one day you find a seed emanating a shining light, the powers of this seed allow you to jump around and explore the world at your heart's content. Meanwhile, the apprehensive voice of your mother echoes through the world, encouraging you to beware of the seed... What exactly are its secrets?

DEVELOPED BY:

ANOTHER BOX CLOSED (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 2, 2018/2019)

Andrea Abissi
Angelo Portaluri
